name: Alameda County Workforce Development Board
description: Free career services, job training, and employment support in Alameda County
fullDescription: Alameda County's America's Job Centers provide free career services including job search assistance, training, and employment support throughout the East Bay.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free career counseling and assessment
- Job search workshops and resources
- Resume and interview preparation
- Occupational skills training
- On-the-job training opportunities
- Supportive services (transportation, childcare)
- Connection to local employers
howToGetIt:
1. Visit an America's Job Center in Alameda County
2. Locations in Oakland, Fremont, Hayward, and more
3. Complete registration and assessment
4. Work with career counselor on employment plan
5. Access training and job placement services
keywords: Alameda County, workforce, AJCC, America's Job Center, Oakland, job training, career services, employment, East Bay
